:• 2x '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''3800 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Verizon 5G Home Router}} "48.LRV51.SGC" and "2018.06.21" is silkscreened on the RF board :in the FCC photos. {{FCC ST|03/27/2019}} ===See also=== * [[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]]
